We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private WilderMovingAverage _wwma;
// In Initialize()
_wwma = WWMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_wwma.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "WWMA Is Ready", _wwma.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "WWMA Warm Up Period", _wwma.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "WWMA Current", _wwma.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "WWMA Name", _wwma.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "WWMA Samples", _wwma.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.wwma = self.WWMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.wwma.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WWMA Is Ready", self.wwma.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WWMA Warm Up Period", self.wwma.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WWMA Current", self.wwma.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WWMA Name", self.wwma.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "WWMA Samples", self.wwma.Samples);
